title: LoL Replay
body:
How do I hide the mouse cursor?! I want to record a video/montage. 

Thanks!

replies.body:
When you're recording the Replay or when you're in game? 
If you're in game and recording it: You can't. 
If you're recording from a Replay then make it so the replay follows you only and hide the mouse at the end of the screen. 
I'm not that technically advanced so that's all i can suggest.  
There's a site for watching previous games but i can't seem to remember it. 
Hope this helps!
~Catspeare {{champion:268}} {{champion:203}} {{champion:4}}
